author: barnabemonnot
content:
Call was super nice on Wednesday! If you missed it, here is the recording: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=m5HFO4DYckQ

As I mentioned there, the call is both a point to synthesise a few threads, and a place to project forward on what remains to be learned/decided. Going through the recording and the zoom chat, I tried to single out some of the questions/thoughts that emerged there. Will post them as threads below, and cc relevant parties to the discussion!

author: barnabemonnot
content: ❓Is SSF a priority for bridging and interoperability?

author: barnabemonnot
content: ❓MinEB in a capped validator set world

author: barnabemonnot
content: ❓Confirmation rule to fill the gap for faster finality?

author: barnabemonnot
content: ❓Should SSF and shorter slot times be bundled?

author: barnabemonnot
content: ❓What are the biggest priorities for interop world?
